Saw bits of the premiere of Victoria last night. Comparisons to The Young Victoria (Emily Blunt) were in my head as I watched.
@rtanglao How long ago was that? I miss going to Revolver…

I could have stayed out there on the ice all day. If you haven't gone to Trout Lake yet, go! Your regular winter footwear is ok.

Final run mileage: 1,262 km (784 mi). Surpassed my goal of 1,200 km (or 100 km/month). Tomorrow, the odometer starts again at zero… #runnerd
Finished the year with a 4-mile, 40-minute turn on the #dreadmill. Tabulating final mileage…
Normally I'd have a beer after a run. Tonight, it's two beer then run. 'Tis the season, right? #beerforrun https://t.co/oXKyBxTU6o

Don't know about you, but I'm done with the snow now.
@sarahslean I just went through all your @pledgemusic updates. I love how you make the making of each song come to life.
After the craziness of the last month, it was good to have a "me" day today. Short work week starting tomorrow, then another long weekend!
